statements: SELECT id, date, revenue FROM operational_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, profit FROM operational_metrics WHERE expenses > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM operational_metrics WHERE revenue < 5000 AND expenses >= 2000;
SELECT id, profit FROM operational_metrics WHERE profit BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY profit DESC, id ASC;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses FROM operational_metrics;
SELECT * FROM operational_metrics WHERE profit > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, revenue FROM operational_metrics WHERE expenses < 5000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT id, revenue, expenses, profit FROM operational_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM operational_metrics WHERE revenue > expenses AND profit > 500 ORDER BY profit DESC
SELECT id, date, revenue, expenses, profit FROM operational_metrics WHERE revenue = expenses AND profit = 0 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM table1;
SELECT column3, column1, column2 FROM table1;
SELECT column2, column1 FROM table1;
SELECT column1, column4, column5 FROM table2;
SELECT column5 FROM table2;
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM table1 WHERE column1 = 'value1';
SELECT * FROM table2 WHERE column4 > 100 ORDER BY column5 DESC;
SELECT column2, column3, column1 FROM table1 WHERE column3 LIKE '%keyword%';
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table1 INNER JOIN table2 ON table1.column1 = table2.column1 WHERE table1.column3 = 'value3';
SELECT DISTINCT column4, column5 FROM table2 WHERE column4 < 500 GROUP BY column5 HAVING COUNT(column4) > 2;
SELECT * FROM MetricsData;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM MetricsData WHERE metric_value > 10;
SELECT * FROM AnalysisResults ORDER BY analysis_value DESC;
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_value FROM AnalysisResults WHERE analysis_value < 0;
SELECT operation_name, operation_type FROM OperationsData;
SELECT * FROM MetricsData WHERE metric_value > 100
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM MetricsData WHERE metric_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT * FROM OperationsData WHERE operation_type = 'read'
SELECT operation_name, operation_type FROM OperationsData WHERE operation_type = 'write' ORDER BY operation_name ASC
SELECT * FROM AnalysisResults WHERE analysis_value < 0.5
SELECT * FROM operations_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT report_name, timestamp, metrics_data FROM metrics_reports WHERE report_id > 500 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, operation_type, duration_seconds FROM operations_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM operations_metrics WHERE operation_type = 'insert' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT user_id, report_name FROM metrics_reports WHERE user_id IN (23456, 34567, 45678) ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(duration_seconds) AS max_duration, MIN(duration_seconds) AS min_duration FROM operations_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM operational_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM operational_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employee_metrics JOIN department_metrics ON employee_metrics.department_id = department_metrics.department_id;
SELECT project_name, client_name FROM project_metrics JOIN client_metrics ON project_metrics.project_id = client_metrics.project_id;
SELECT metric_name, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM operational_metrics GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT * FROM operational_metrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM operational_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';

SELECT employee_name, department_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM employee_metrics JOIN department_metrics ON employee_metrics.department_id = department_metrics.department_id JOIN operational_metrics ON department_metrics.metric_id = operational_metrics.metric_id;

SELECT department_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_metric_value FROM department_metrics JOIN operational_metrics ON department_metrics.metric_id = operational_metrics.metric_id GROUP BY department_name;

SELECT project_name, client_name, metric_value FROM project_metrics JOIN client_metrics ON project_metrics.project_id = client_metrics.project_id JOIN operational_metrics ON project_metrics.department_id = operational_metrics.metric_id WHERE metric_value > 100;
